channel.title: Comments on: SSRS Properties – Image Source
channel.description: A Technical Community for IT Professionals

item.title: By: Jes Borland
item.dc:creator: Jes Borland
item.description: That's a tough question to answer. Typically, I'd think a database source would be faster - but, it also depends on what the external source is. is it on your network, is the network speed good?
item.content:encoded: That’s a tough question to answer. Typically, I’d think a database source would be faster – but, it also depends on what the external source is. is it on your network, is the network speed good?

item.title: By: Paul Hernandez
item.dc:creator: Paul Hernandez
item.description:
Hi Jens,
thanks for the article.
Just on question, regarding the performance, which option performs better, external or database source images? We have the discussion today and apart from the management tasks for either option the performance is still under analysis.
Thanks in advance, Paul
item.content:encoded:
Hi Jens,

thanks for the article.

Just on question, regarding the performance, which option performs better, external or database source images? We have the discussion today and apart from the management tasks for either option the performance is still under analysis.

Thanks in advance,
Paul
